tweets.text: At an excellent @EUauditors panel, Andrea Enria (@ecb) and Elke K√∂nig (@EU_SRB) both agreed that time is ripe to repeal the Covid-19 temporary State Aid framework and again require burden-sharing in precautionary recapitalisations. Brexit and the resulting drop in UK demand for goods from the euro area have caused a sizeable drag on exports. Future UK trade deficits with the euro area will require net financial inflows to remain sustainable. Read more https://t.co/lnuM0o80EC #EconomicBulletin https://t.co/KeVzvj8qq8

The rapid recovery in activity and trade is the main driver of the recent surge in shipping costs. This demand is also causing global supply shortages and bottlenecks as production capacity adjusts only slowly. Read more https://t.co/Vysgyhe6x5 #EconomicBulletin https://t.co/tzabbClo6T
